#include<iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
 
int compare (const void * a, const void * b)
{
  return ( *(int*)a - *(int*)b );
}
 
int main()
{
    int tc;cin>>tc;
    for(int lp=0;lp<tc;lp++)
    {
    int no;cin >> no;
    int arr[no];
    for(int i=0;i<no;i++)
        cin >> arr[i];
 
    qsort(arr,no,sizeof(int),compare);
    int countmax=1,count=1,num=arr[0],nummax=arr[0];
    for(int i=1;i<no;i++)
    {
        if(arr[i] == arr[i-1])
            count++;
        else
            {
                if(countmax < count)
                  {
                      countmax=count;
                      nummax=num;
                  }
                count=1;
                num=arr[i];
            }
    }
    if(countmax < count)
                  {
                      countmax=count;
                      nummax=num;
                  }
   
        cout<<nummax<<" "<<countmax<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
